select.sql:
select kic.flowid,kic.mntrsq,kic.trandt,kic.mntrtm ,kic.uniseq,kic.unkpdt,kic.untrdt,kic.untrtm,kic.agid01,kic.ad01na,kic.ad01am,kic.refeno, kic.ordeno,kic.tranam ,kic.chrgam,kic.jnanam, regexp_substr(kic.merate,'[^|]+',1,1) as merate, regexp_substr(kic.merate,'[^|]+',1,6) as onefee, kic.voucfe,kic.prpoin,kic.toanam,kic.inmeid,kic.inmena,kic.teleno,kic.pabkno,kic.cardtp as pycdtp,kic.pameno,kic.pamena,kic.transt ,kic.spcipy,kic.mercfg,kic.finsty,kic.acfist,kic.sbrand,kic.busitp, kic.tmad01na,kic.tminmena,kic.tmpabkno,kic.tmpamena,kic.tmteleno, kic.cardno,kie.mntrsq as ottrsq,kie.trandt as dfdate,kie.mntrtm as dftime,kie.tranam as dfamt, kie.retrsq as intrsq,kie.retrdt as indate, kie.sacdna,kie.sabkna,kie.sacdno,kie.bankno,kie.transt as dfst,kie.retmsg from knl_iobl_cups kic left join knl_iobl_edm_contro kiec on kiec.retrsq=kic.mntrsq
left join knl_iobl_edm kie on kie.mntrsq=kiec.mntrsq where kic.mntrsq=#mntrsq# and kic.corpno=#corpno#
